name: Outro
commands: You're all useless!|No matter, they'll see retribution some day...
The Duke truly is a demon!
Seems like he's wrapped around the finger of Aurelia.
I wish that this would all end...
Even if Arcei did those things...|I doubt Aurelia are perfect either. Allying with Monsdor...|Influencing cretins, such as the Duke...|What can we even do...?
We need to go to Aurelia. Fight them if we have to.
We may need to speak to them, not fight.
Because talking to people worked so well this time...
We can't just fight our way through, even if that's how things have been...
Hmph, fine.|Though I hope Nabin is alright...
Why do you have to do these things to me?|Now they'll squeak about how awful they think I am.
How awful you are, more like.
You ingrate...|You have to make this up to me.|You must realise your errors.
Father, you've changed.|I don't know who these people you're speaking to are...|But they aren't good for you!
Nonsense.|The Goddess adores gold... that's what I am obeying!
G-Gold?! That's what this is about?!
We will take to Aurelia.|I must make you see the light, the golden light...
Suffer eternal damnation if you don't.
Our boat leaves tomorrow.|Now, rest up.|I- I mean, WE will have a great time.
source:
move_cursor;Hogarth
add_portrait;Hogarth;Left
speak;Hogarth;You're all useless!|No matter, they'll see retribution some day...
transition;close
change_background;Forest 2 Evening
music;Reminiscences ~ Killers' Crossroads
transition;open
multi_add_portrait;Leap;Left;Prof;Right
speak;Leap;That was...
speak;Prof;Horrible.
speak;Leap;The Duke truly is a demon!
speak;Prof;Seems like he's wrapped around the finger of Aurelia.
speak;Leap;I wish that this would all end...
speak;Prof;Even if Arcei did those things...|I doubt Aurelia are perfect either. Allying with Monsdor...|Influencing cretins, such as the Duke...|What can we even do...?
speak;Leap;We need to go to Aurelia. Fight them if we have to.
speak;Prof;We may need to speak to them, not fight.
speak;Leap;Because talking to people worked so well this time...
speak;Prof;We can't just fight our way through, even if that's how things have been...
speak;Leap;Hmph, fine.|Though I hope Nabin is alright...
transition;close
remove_all_units
add_unit;Hogarth;2,2;immediate;stack;fade
add_unit;Nabin;2,4;immediate;stack;fade
transition;open
multi_add_portrait;Hogarth;Left;Nabin;Right
speak;Nabin;...;FLAG(no_talk)
speak;Hogarth;Why do you have to do these things to me?|Now they'll squeak about how awful they think I am.
speak;Nabin;How awful you are, more like.
speak;Hogarth;You ingrate...|You have to make this up to me.|You must realise your errors.
speak;Nabin;Father, you've changed.|I don't know who these people you're speaking to are...|But they aren't good for you!
speak;Hogarth;Nonsense.|The Goddess adores gold... that's what I am obeying!
speak;Nabin;G-Gold?! That's what this is about?!
speak;Hogarth;We will take to Aurelia.|I must make you see the light, the golden light...
speak;Nabin;Do I have a choice...?
speak;Hogarth;Suffer eternal damnation if you don't.
speak;Nabin;Alright...
speak;Hogarth;Our boat leaves tomorrow.|Now, rest up.|I- I mean, WE will have a great time.
speak;Nabin;Alright, father...
transition;close
